## Source: ossf-package-analysis (c4c2c1792a68f7c43c864353d67a2d92d339b9bd8df1b43a5a1258b7a8172fab)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified '@abdallaeg/sap_access' @ 0.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
